original: intros net net' tr H_step. unfold step_ordered in H_step. destruct H_step as [H_deliver | H_input]. - left. destruct H_deliver as [H_pckts H_handlers]. unfold pt_map_onet in *. rewrite H_pckts. rewrite H_handlers. split; reflexivity. - right. destruct H_input as [H_notin H_handlers]. unfold pt_map_onet in *. rewrite H_handlers. split; reflexivity.
